name: CKShare.Metadata
desc: An object that describes a shared record’s metadata.

items.name: var share: CKShare
items.desc: The share that owns the metadata.

items.name: var containerIdentifier: String
items.desc: The ID of the share’s container.

items.name: var ownerIdentity: CKUserIdentity
items.desc: The identity of the share’s owner.

items.name: var hierarchicalRootRecordID: CKRecord.ID?
items.desc: The record ID of the shared hierarchy’s root record.

items.name: var participantRole: CKShare.ParticipantRole
items.desc: The share’s participant role for the user who retrieves the metadata.

items.name: var participantPermission: CKShare.ParticipantPermission
items.desc: The share’s permissions for the user who retrieves the metadata.

items.name: var participantStatus: CKShare.ParticipantAcceptanceStatus
items.desc: The share’s participation status for the user who retrieves the metadata.
